Using Geographies

Generating Network within Geographies

For most network generators it is sufficient to use the MGeoRsNetworkEdgeModifier:

--- MoreNetworkModifierthis.edgeModifier = new MGeoRsNetworkEdgeModifierAgentType, EdgeType(this.edgeFac, geography, geoFactory); ---
